com.deezer.sdk.player

Class AlbumPlayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • AbstractTrackListPlayer
      • com.deezer.sdk.player.AlbumPlayer

  • public class AlbumPlayer
extends AbstractTrackListPlayer
    A PlayerWrapper used to play a Deezer Album.

    An album player can be launched very easily using the follonwing code : 

     
      AlbumPlayer albumPlayer = new AlbumPlayer(application, deezerConnect, new WifiOnlyNetworkStateChecker());
      albumPlayer.addPlayerListener(listener);
      albumPlayer.playAlbum(albumId);
    Author:
    Deezer

    • Constructor Detail

      • AlbumPlayer

        public AlbumPlayer(android.app.Application application,
           DeezerConnect deezerConnect,
           NetworkStateChecker networkStateChecker)
            throws OAuthException,
                   TooManyPlayersExceptions,
                   DeezerError
        Creates an autonomous AlbumPlayer. No parameter can be null
        Parameters:
        application - the current application
        deezerConnect - a deezerConnect object initialised to be used with Deezer Album
        networkStateChecker - a component able to monitor network availability.
        Throws:
        OAuthException - if the deezerConnect's token is not valid
        TooManyPlayersExceptions
        DeezerError - if deezerConnect is not properly initialized

    • Method Detail

      • playAlbum

        public void playAlbum(long albumId)
        Starts playing an album
        Parameters:
        albumId - the id of the album play

      • playAlbum

        public void playAlbum(long albumId,
             int trackIndex)
        Starts playing an album at the given track
        Parameters:
        albumId - the id of the album play
        trackIndex - the index of the track to play first. If the index is less than 0 or greater than the number of tracks in the album, then the album will start at the first track

      • getCurrentTrackIndex

        public int getCurrentTrackIndex()
        Returns:
        the index of the current track being played
